text: musa, navu nigadipadisida avadhigagi bandaga, tam'ma odeyanodane matanadidaru. Nannodeya, nanu ninnannu nodaballantaha drstiyannu ninu nanage nidu endu avaru helidaru. Avanu (allahanu) helidanu; nannannu nodalu ninage sadhyavilla. Adare ninu a parvatadedege nodu, adu tanna sthanadalle nintiddare ninu nannannu nodabahudu. Taruvaya avara odeyanu parvatadedege divya belakannu biri adannu curu curagisi bittanu mattu musa prajne kaledukondu biddubittaru. A balika avarige prajne bandaga avaru helidaru; ninu parama pavananu, nanu pascattapa pattu ninnedege maraluttene mattu nambuvavara paiki nanu prathamanaguttene
